channel.title: What is a Computer? (Part 2) :: Intro CS Textbook
channel.description: Resources Slides Video Script So now that we have the capability of computing values without human error, once we have that ability, the next important part of the computer is to accept variable input from the user. And as I mentioned before, itâ€™s not just the fact that we can input numbers into the computer. But, what if we could actually reprogram the device? Right? What if we could enable certain features or certain abilities of that computer by just pushing the input?
